title: Did an EU Official Recommend Adding ‘Jewish-Made’ Warning Labels to Products?
subtitle: Right-leaning U.S. websites grossly misrepresented advice given to the European Court of Justice in the summer of 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the summer of 2019, based on advice from an advocate general, the European Court of Justice was set to require "Jewish-made" products to be labeled as such.
